author: MSNBC.com
title: North Carolina’s Attorney General responds to Trump’s suggestion voters should vote twice in November
description: Alarmed by a series of tweets, North Carolina’s Attorney General Josh Stein speaks with Kasie Hunt about the president’s repeated suggestion voters in his state vote twice, which is a felony in 28 states.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Sen. Manchin: lawlessness in the U.S. is happening “on Donald Trump’s Watch”
description: Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV) reminds everyone that the lawlessness in the country is “happening under Donald Trump’s watch,” not Joe Biden, and says that the president needs to stop blaming everyone else including Democrats for what’s going on in the country.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Franken on President Trump: 'he really is disturbing.'

author: MSNBC.com
title: Businesses owned by Black women were thriving, then the pandemic hit
